Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Defines the terms "cell" and "out-of-cell"
Summary: Defines the terms "cell" and "out-of-cell" to clarify meaning of cell confinement and the amount or type of space deemed a cell or out-of-cell.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to the definitions of cell and out-of-cell
